amarapura dharmarakshitha maha nikaye maha nayaka rajakiya panditha shastha්rapathi pujya thi්rakunamalaye aananda nayaka swaminwahanse, rajakiya panditha pujya aththaragama wajirajothi anunayaka swaminwahanse, kolambaa maligakanda widyodaya piriwene pariwenadhipathi rajakiya panditha pujya balangoda sobhitha nayaka himipanan wahanse pa්ramukha maha sangharathnaya da amathya wijayadasa rajapaksha, ee.ech.em. fawusi, basnahira palath pa්radhana amathya isura dewapi්raya yana mahathwarun athulu mathi amathiwaru pirisak saha pa්radeshawasi sadahawath janathawa wishala pirisak mema punya mahothsawayata ekwa sitiyaha.
